mapper.select: SELECT HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY , HR.PATIENT_KEY , PATIENT_NAME , PATIENT_AGE , PATIENT_SEX , PATIENT_REGNO1 , WARD_KEY , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE=PATIENT_TYPE) AS PATIENT_TYPE_NAME , ORDER_KEY FROM HOSPITALIZE_RECORD HR LEFT OUTER JOIN PATIENT P ON (HR.PATIENT_KEY = P.PATIENT_KEY) LEFT OUTER JOIN WARD_BED WB ON (HR.WARD_BED_KEY = WB.WARD_BED_KEY) WHERE CHECK_OUT_DATE IS NULL

SELECT W.WARD_KEY , WB.WARD_BED_KEY , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE = WARD_BED_STATUS) AS WARD_BED_STATUS , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE = WARD_GRADE) AS WARD_GRADE , PATIENT_NAME , PATIENT_KEY , HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY , EXPECTED_CHECK_OUT_DATE , CHECK_IN_DATE , TRUNC(SYSDATE - CHECK_IN_DATE) + 1 AS WARD_ING_DATE FROM WARD_BED WB RIGHT OUTER JOIN WARD W ON (WB.WARD_KEY = W.WARD_KEY) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT WARD_BED_KEY, PATIENT_NAME, CHECK_IN_DATE , EXPECTED_CHECK_OUT_DATE, HR.PATIENT_KEY, HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY FROM HOSPITALIZE_RECORD HR LEFT OUTER JOIN PATIENT P ON (HR.PATIENT_KEY = P.PATIENT_KEY) WHERE EXPECTED_CHECK_OUT_DATE > SYSDATE AND CHECK_OUT_DATE IS NULL ) A ON (WB.WARD_BED_KEY = A.WARD_BED_KEY) ORDER BY WARD_BED_KEY

SELECT CHART_CONT , (SELECT DISEASE_NM_KR FROM DISEASE WHERE DISEASE.DISEASE_KEY = D.DISEASE_KEY) AS DISEASE_NAME , (SELECT SURGERY_KIND_NAME FROM SURGERY_KIND WHERE SURGERY_KIND_KEY = ORDER_KIND) AS ORDER_NAME , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMP WHERE EMP.EMP_KEY = MC.EMP_KEY) AS EMP_NAME FROM MEDICAL_CHART MC LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDER_HISTORY OH ON(MC.CHART_KEY = OH.CHART_KEY) LEFT OUTER JOIN DIAGNOSIS D ON (MC.CHART_KEY = D.CHART_KEY) LEFT OUTER JOIN PATIENT P ON (MC.PATIENT_KEY = P.PATIENT_KEY) WHERE MC.CHART_KEY = ( SELECT CHART_KEY FROM ORDER_HISTORY WHERE ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey} ) AND ORDER_KIND LIKE 'S%'

SELECT 'HR' || LPAD(HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 5,'0') FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO HOSPITALIZE_RECORD ( HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY , PATIENT_KEY , WARD_BED_KEY , ORDER_KEY , HOSPITALIZE_DOCTOR_KEY , CHECK_IN_DATE , EXPECTED_CHECK_OUT_DATE ) SELECT #{hospitalizeRecordKey} , A.* FROM( SELECT PATIENT_KEY , #{wardBedKey} AS WARD_BED_KEY , ORDER_KEY , EMP_KEY AS HOSPITALIZE_DOCTOR_KEY , SYSDATE AS CHECK_IN_DATE , SYSDATE + (SELECT SURGERY_HOSPITALIZE_AVG FROM SURGERY_KIND WHERE SURGERY_KIND_KEY=ORDER_KIND) AS EXPECTED_CHECK_OUT_DATE FROM MEDICAL_CHART MC LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDER_HISTORY OH ON (MC.CHART_KEY = OH.CHART_KEY) WHERE PATIENT_KEY = #{patientKey} AND ORDER_KIND LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY MC.CHART_KEY DESC )A WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.select: SELECT CODE, CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_DESCRIPTION = 'Diet Kind'

SELECT NURSE_CHART_KEY , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMP WHERE EMP_KEY = NURSE_CHART_WRITER) AS EMP_NAME , NURSE_CHART_DATE , NURSE_CHART_CONTENT FROM NURSE_CHART WHERE HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey} ORDER BY NURSE_CHART_DATE DESC

SELECT DIET_KEY , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE = DIET_MEALS) AS DIET_MEALS_NAME , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE = DIET_KIND) AS DIET_KIND_NAME , DIET_INTAKE , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMP WHERE EMP_KEY = DIET_WRITER) AS EMP_NAME , DIET_TIME FROM DIET WHERE HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey} ORDER BY DIET_TIME DESC
SELECT VITAL_KEY , HYPER_BP , HYPO_BP , PULSE , RESPIRATION , TEMPERATURE , VITAL_DATE FROM VITAL WHERE HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey} ORDER BY VITAL_DATE DESC
SELECT IO_KEY , IO_INTAKE , IO_OUTPUT , IO_DATE FROM IO WHERE HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey} ORDER BY IO_DATE DESC

SELECT RR.ROUNDS_RECORD_KEY , M.MEDICINE_KEY , MEDICINE_NAME , RP_DAY , MEDICINE_EA , MEDICINE_ROUTE FROM ROUNDS_RECORD RR LEFT OUTER JOIN ROUNDS_PRESCRIPTION RP ON(RR.ROUNDS_RECORD_KEY = RP.ROUNDS_RECORD_KEY) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICINE M ON(RP.MEDICINE_KEY = M.MEDICINE_KEY) WHERE HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey} AND TO_CHAR(ROUNDS_RECORD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT MEDICINE_KEY , MEDICINE_NAME , MEDICINE_EA , MEDICINE_ROUTE FROM MEDICINE

SELECT RR.ROUNDS_RECORD_KEY , ROUNDS_RECORD_DATE , ROUNDS_RECORD_WRITER , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMP WHERE EMP_KEY = ROUNDS_RECORD_WRITER) AS WRITER_NAME , M.MEDICINE_KEY , MEDICINE_NAME , RP_DAY , MEDICINE_EA , MEDICINE_ROUTE FROM ROUNDS_RECORD RR LEFT OUTER JOIN ROUNDS_PRESCRIPTION RP ON(RR.ROUNDS_RECORD_KEY = RP.ROUNDS_RECORD_KEY) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICINE M ON(RP.MEDICINE_KEY = M.MEDICINE_KEY) WHERE HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey}

SELECT MEDICINE_RECORD_KEY , MEDICINE_RECORD_CONTENT , MEDICINE_RECORD_DATE , MEDICINE_RECORD_WRITER , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMP WHERE EMP_KEY = MEDICINE_RECORD_WRITER) AS MEDICINE_RECORD_WRITER_NAME , MEDICINE_KEY , (SELECT MEDICINE_NAME FROM MEDICINE WHERE MEDICINE.MEDICINE_KEY = MEDICINE_RECORD.MEDICINE_KEY) AS MEDICINE_NAME FROM MEDICINE_RECORD WHERE HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE HOSPITALIZE_RECORD SET CHECK_OUT_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY_DETAIL ( PAY_DETAIL_KEY , PAY_KEY , PAY_KIND , PAY_COST , PAY_PERCENTAGE ) SELECT 'PAY' || LPAD(PAY_DIETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL,3,'0') , (SELECT PAY_KEY FROM PAY WHERE PAY.HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey}) AS PAY_KEY , 'PK12' , A.* , 50 FROM( SELECT COUNT(*) * 4750 FROM DIET WHERE HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey} )A
INSERT INTO WAITING_HISTORY( WAITING_KEY , WAITING_CHANGE_TIME , WAITING_LOCATION , HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY )VALUES( WAITING_HISTORY_SEQ.NEXTVAL , SYSDATE , 'L008' , #{hospitalizeRecordKey} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEDICINE SET MEDICINE_REMINDER = MEDICINE_REMINDER-1 WHERE MEDICINE_KEY = #{medicineKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY_DETAIL ( PAY_DETAIL_KEY , PAY_KEY , PAY_KIND , PAY_COST , PAY_PERCENTAGE ) SELECT 'PAY' || LPAD(PAY_DIETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL,3,'0') , (SELECT PAY_KEY FROM PAY WHERE PAY.HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey}) AS PAY_KEY , 'PK03' , A.* , 30 FROM( SELECT NVL(SUM(MEDICINE_COST),0) FROM MEDICINE_RECORD MR LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDICINE M ON (MR.MEDICINE_KEY = M.MEDICINE_KEY) WHERE HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey} )A

INSERT INTO PAY_DETAIL ( PAY_DETAIL_KEY , PAY_KEY , PAY_KIND , PAY_COST , PAY_PERCENTAGE ) SELECT 'PAY' || LPAD(PAY_DIETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL,3,'0') , (SELECT PAY_KEY FROM PAY WHERE PAY.HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey}) AS PAY_KEY , 'PK02' , A.* , 20 FROM( SELECT CEIL(SYSDATE - CHECK_IN_DATE) * (SELECT WARD_PRICE FROM WARD WHERE WARD.WARD_KEY = WB.WARD_KEY) FROM HOSPITALIZE_RECORD H LEFT OUTER JOIN WARD_BED WB ON(H.WARD_BED_KEY = WB.WARD_BED_KEY) WHERE HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY = #{hospitalizeRecordKey} )A
